casebody.data:
Cleveland Bar Association et al. v. Mallory.

[Cite as Cleveland Bar Assn. v. Mallory (1992), 65 Ohio St.3d 12.]

(No. 92-833 — Submitted July 29, 1992 — Decided October 14, 1992.) *13Michael E. Murman, Harvey A. Snider and Stuart I. Garson, for relators. Sidney S. Mallory, Jr., pro se. Per Curiam.

We concur in the findings and recommendation of the board. Respondent is hereby indefinitely suspended from the practice of law in Ohio. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur.
